name: B.R.I.E.F.
description:
Operation B.R.I.E.F.

B.R.I.E.F. is a top-down tactical action game. Take on the role of The Agent, sent by the government, to make the evil billionaire Chet Mooney pay his taxes! Use your special briefcase to fight employees, navigate deadly mazes and traps, and take Chet Mooney down!

Main Developers:

  • Jason Debel (Developer)
  • Michael Liu (Developer)
  • Salvatore Ciatti (Developer)
  • Zewen Wu (Developer)
  • Kiva Nguyen (Developer, voice of Chet Mooney)

Special thanks to:

  • Justin Applefield (Music)
  • MuYuan Ma (Cover Art)
  • Yao Lin (Voice Acting)
